text: niyata vaśayenma kavurun ṛju mārgaya meya yayi taman tuḷa pæhædili vū pasuvada, (eya) pratikṣēpa kara damā, allāhgē mārgaya (an ayaṭa) vaḷakvā lamin (allāhgē) dūtayāṭa viruddhava kaṭayutu karannōda, ovun (emagin) niyata vaśayenma allāhṭa kisima hāniyak kara hærīmaṭa nohækiya. ovungē (kumantraṇa vana) væḍa kaṭayutu (siyalla) niyata vaśayenma allāh vināśa kara damanu æta
